name: BlockBuster (DrTronik, bluesnorkel, Deliciouzlp, Xeroera, DragoFlower, Astrator)
name_original: BlockBuster (DrTronik, bluesnorkel, Deliciouzlp, Xeroera, DragoFlower, Astrator)
description:
Blockbuster is a fast-paced Action Game.
You are the monster in an upcoming movie and you got the task to destroy the city within a limited timeframe. 
As the monster you can chain multiple attacks together to destroy the city in style. Use varied attacks to create combos and get the High-score!

There is a vast variety of houses and buildings you can destroy, as well as smaller objects, like cars and trees, that you can throw around, for even more destruction.

Controls

Project

BlockBuster is part of the HTK GAME JAM | 2022 Ice Edition.
